attributes.action: A long overdue rework to the British school system.
attributes.additional_details: Our world is changing faster than ever, yet schools are still teaching outdated material. Students need more than facts—they need skills like critical thinking, problem-solving, digital literacy, and adaptability to thrive in the future. If education doesn’t evolve, students will be unprepared for the challenges of tomorrow. It’s time to modernize the curriculum and equip young people with the tools they need to succeed in a rapidly developing world.
attributes.background: Rework how the school system works to accommodate the fact that many students learn differently. Right now the system can have a severe impact on mental health ( Standardized testing contributes a lot) and doesn’t even teach students relevant skills such as financial knowledge.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like a rework to the school system, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following:

Add critical thinking to the national curriculum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741973

Add Economics & Business to national curriculum (for entrepreneurial skills)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737807

Introduce mandatory business and entrepreneurship in secondary curriculum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741347
